products.name: Mango
products.description: Mango is a sweet-tasting fruit of the genus Mango, which includes numerous tropical fruits, grown mainly as edible fruit. The majority of species found in the wild are wild mangoes. They all belong to the Anacardiaceae family of flowering plants.
